desc: All of our paint is eco-friendly and non-toxic. It can be used on multiple surfaces including in bathrooms and kitchens as well as on furniture. It only comes in one finish, matt, so as to not harm the planet. Radical is a highly durable, waterborne paint that is 100% plastic free

layout.text:
We’re spearheading a radical overhaul of the paint industry by changing the fundamental nature of paint. Durable, wipeable and safe to use, without costing the earth.
We believe the future is Radical.
We have lift off .. please feel free to Shop Paint
